snippet: While New Orleans is known for its food, booze and jazz, there is a deep history of underground bookies and bettors in this city’s underbelly.
abstract: New Orleans deep history of underground gambling continues to thrive as city prepares to host Super Bowl XLVII.
lead_paragraph: While New Orleans is known for its food, booze and jazz, there is a deep history of underground bookies and bettors in this city’s underbelly.

headline.seo: New Orleans Has History of Bookmaking and Illegal Betting
headline.main: A City Where Underground Gambling Plays by Its Own Rules
headline.print_headline: A City Where Underground Gambling Plays by Its Own Time-Honored Rules
